title: The Prehistoric Mother Tongue (minicast) - 15 Sept. 2009
description:
Many of the world's languages apparently derived from a prehistoric common ancestor known as Indo-European. But since no one ever wrote down a word of it, how do we know what it was like?  --  Get your language question answered on the air!
